name: Prisoner Offroad Transport
description:
Prisoner Transport Game is about transportation of prisoner in offroad driving games adventure. The Prisoners are situated at remote Rocky Mountains. Your job as military prisoner transport driver is to park the coach bus at the base unit and transport army prisoners & criminals to jail, driving through the rocky mountain area to base camp.

Your mission will be transportation of army prisoners’ in Bus, jeep, Speed Boat and choppers. Load the jeeps on to cargo plane parked at the base, drive the coach bus and park it inside the Army base, guard the prisoner bus and park it safely as the prisoners and soldiers are locked inside the prison bus. Take prisoners in high security on your coach bus and take them to the secured prison cells. There are some cargo transport tasks that include tank transportation, truck driving, jeep driving in this game.

Features
* Challenging Transporter offroad missions with extreme time limit.
* Realistic HD graphics & engaging sound effects.
* Multiple cars, jeeps and plane selection
